org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution.kernel

Interface UnivariateKernel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardUnivariateKernels

    public interface UnivariateKernel
    A Univariate kernel (i.e. a 1-d window function with an underlying distribution)
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double evaluate(double value)
      Evaluate the kernel at the given value
      double getCutOff()
      Get the absolute value at which the kernel's response is essentially zero.
      double sample(Random rng)
      Draw a sample from the kernel's underlying distribution

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        double sample(Random rng)
        Draw a sample from the kernel's underlying distribution
        Parameters:
        rng - the random generator
        Returns:
        a sample

      • getCutOff

        double getCutOff()
        Get the absolute value at which the kernel's response is essentially zero.
        Returns:
        the value for zero response

      • evaluate

        double evaluate(double value)
        Evaluate the kernel at the given value
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the kernel response
